column1: Q4. Which CNCF Project(s) are you maintaining?
Q5. Do you feel that CNCF reached out to collaborate and gather info about your project needs?
Yes, and my needs were generally met
Yes, but my needs were not generally met
Q6. Do you have a good understanding of the resources and programs available to you (i.e., CNCF ServiceDesk)?10 - strongly agree, 1 - strongly disagree.
Q7. Did you feel that the CNCF staff responded quickly to your requests?10 - strongly agree, 1 - strongly disagree.
Q8. Did you feel that the CNCF TOC responded quickly to your requests?10 - strongly agree, 1 - strongly disagree.
Q9. Are your documentation needs being met (e.g., website, tech writing)?10 - strongly agree, 1 - strongly disagree.
Q10. Are your CI needs being met (e.g., Travis CI, Circle CI, GitHub Actions etc)?10 - strongly agree, 1 - strongly disagree.
Q11. Are your security needs being met (e.g., security audits)?10 - strongly agree, 1 - strongly disagree.
Q12. Are your non-CI tooling needs being met (e.g., bots or automation)?10 - strongly agree, 1 - strongly disagree.
Q13. Are your marketing needs being met (e.g., events, velocity reports)?10 - strongly agree, 1 - strongly disagree.
Q14. Are you satisfied with the overall support your project receives from CNCF (e.g., marketing, budget, scholarships, events etc)10 - strongly agree, 1 - strongly disagree.
Q15. Would you recommend CNCF to other open source projects, and why?10 - strongly agree, 1 - strongly disagree.
Q16. Do you find the CNCF DevStats tool valuable for the needs of your project?10 - highly valuable, 1 - not valuable at all.
Q17. Do you find the CNCF Cloud Native Landscape tool valuable for the needs of your project?10 - highly valuable, 1 - not valuable at all.
Q18. Do you find the CNCF End User Tech Radar tool valuable for the needs of your project?10 - highly valuable, 1 - not valuable at all.
Q19. What diversity efforts could CNCF help out with for your project (e.g., maintainers, scholarships)?
Q20. What marketing efforts could CNCF help out with (e.g., project booths, webinars)?
Q21. What services do you wish the CNCF provided that it doesn't currently?*
Q22. Any other feedback that you wish to share, from what CNCF can do more or what we should do less?
